additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Water, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Glycol Distearate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Glycerin, Dimethiconol, Dimethicone, Amodimethicone, Glucanolactone, Trehalose, Sodium Sulfate, Arginine, Lysine Hcl, Peg-45M, Acrylates/Beheneth-25 Methacrylates Copolymer, Guarhydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Cocamide Mea, Tea-Dodecylbenzenesulfontate, Tea-Sulfate, Poloxamer 407, Laureth-23, Laureth-4, Cetrimonium Chloride, Trideceth-12, Peg-4, Xanthan Gum, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymers, Citric Acid, Disodium Edta, Sodium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance, Mica, Ci 77891, Ci 15985, Ci 19140.

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Caution: Use Only As Directed. Avoid Contact With Eyes. If Eye Contact Occurs, Immediately Rinse With Water. If Rash Or Irritation Occurs, Discontinue Use.

description: Dove Nutritive Solutions Daily Moisture Shampoo
